entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
